comments:
[Vatkov Bogdan]
I have tried to create an EJB Module with SOA ? JAX-WS facet, but the page registered in the ?org.eclipse.stp.sc.jaxws? plug-in is not available:

 

      <extension point="org.eclipse.wst.common.project.facet.ui.wizard">

            <wizard-pages facet="stp.jaxws.component" version="2.0">

                  <install>

                        <page

                              class="org.eclipse.stp.sc.jaxws.facet.JaxWsFacetInstallPage" />

                  </install>

            </wizard-pages>

      </extension>

 

I have checked the CVS state ? there is no such file in the plugin.
